briefTitle: Study of Roxadustat Conversion in Participants Receiving Stable ESA or as Initial Anemia Treatment in Hemodialysis Participants
officialTitle: Phase 3b Multicenter, Open-Label Single Arm Study of Roxadustat: Either as Conversion From an Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agent (ESA), or as Initial Anemia Treatment in Hemodialysis (HD) Patients
conditions: Anemia Associated With End Stage Renal Disease
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and effectiveness of roxadustat dosing regimens among hemodialysis participants converted from erythropoiesis stimulating agent (ESA) therapy or who are ESA-naïve.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Mean Hb Value ≥10 g/dL
